thread.title: China’s Didi Kuaidi Gets License to Ride in Shanghai
thread.title_full: China’s Didi Kuaidi Gets License to Ride in Shanghai - WSJ

author: wsjcom
title: China’s Didi Kuaidi Gets License to Ride in Shanghai
text:
SHANGHAI—Chinese ride-hailing company Didi Kuaidi Joint Co. obtained a license in Shanghai that it said makes it the first authorized operator of an online private-car-booking platform in China.
The license, disclosed on Thursday, comes as Didi Kuaidi and U.S. rival Uber Technologies Inc. grapple with regulatory issues in China, which both see as a major market for fetching rides.
Under an agreement with Shanghai authorities,...
